DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter , prospective , randomize , investigator blind , control clinical trial . Two parallel group , one receive test drug hMG ( hMG-IBSA , IBSA Institut Biochimique sa ) reference drug hMG ( Menopur , Ferring Pharmaceuticals , Inc. ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Clinical Efficacy Tolerability hMG-IBSA s.c.in Women Undergoing COH ART Programme ( IVF ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate clinical efficacy general tolerability two different subcutaneous hMG preparation ( hMG-IBSA , IBSA v Menopur , Ferring Pharmaceuticals , Inc. ) administer patient undergo controlled ovarian stimulation IVF .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo ovarian stimulation IVF without ICSI ( intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) follow characteristic : Voluntary give inform consent study participation write encompass consent data record verification procedure ; > 18/= < 37 year old ; BMI 18 28 kg/m2 ; Less 3 previous complete IVF cycle ; Basal FSH level le 10 IU/L within 6 month prior study ; Within 12 month begin study , uterine cavity consistent expect normal function assess hysterosalpingogram , sonohysterogram , hysteroscopic examination TVUS ; Normal clinically insignificant haematology blood chemistry value . Primary ovarian failure woman know poor responder ; Signs PCO , accord Rotterdam Criteria ; At least one ovary inaccessible oocyte retrieval ; One ovarian cysts > 10 mm ; Hydrosalpinx surgically remove ligate ; Stage III IV endometriosis ; Patients affect pathology associate contraindication pregnant ; Hypersensitivity study medication ; Abnormal bleeding undetermined origin ; Uncontrolled thyroid adrenal dysfunction ; Neoplasias ; PAP smear III within last 2 year ; Severe impairment renal and/or hepatic function ; Lactation ; Hyperprolactinaemia ; Participation concurrent clinical trial another trial within past four week ; Use concomitant medication might interfere study evaluation .
